name: Quaero
description: A freelancing project developed for The Quaero company, initially serving as a marketing website. Future plans include hosting cybersecurity SaaS products to enhance digital security solutions.

name: MediMeet
description: A seamless doctor appointment booking web application that allows users to schedule consultations with healthcare professionals efficiently.

name: NextStep AI
description: An AI-powered career coaching platform that offers personalized career guidance based on user skills, industry trends, and AI-driven recommendations.

name: BlogStack
description: A feature-rich blogging platform with an admin panel, allowing users to publish, edit, and manage articles efficiently.

name: SIH Yatra Website
description: A web application developed during SIH 2023, aimed at enhancing the user experience for Smart India Hackathon participants and organizers.

name: VoiceCraft
description: A real-time speech-to-text converter that transcribes spoken words into text using advanced browser-based speech recognition.

name: Speak Wizard
description: A text-to-speech web application that converts written text into lifelike speech, enhancing accessibility and user experience.

name: Quote Generator
description: A dynamic quote generator that provides users with a fresh motivational quote each time they visit.

name: Spark Quotes Chrome Extension
description: A Chrome extension delivering daily inspirational quotes using a custom-built API for motivation and productivity.

name: Vakil Seva
description: A freelancing legal services platform that connects users with legal professionals for consultation and assistance.

name: Drum Kit Game
description: An interactive and fun drum kit game built with JavaScript, allowing users to play various drum sounds using keyboard inputs.
